cast.overview: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.
cast.title: The Mitchells vs. the Machines

cast.overview: Queen Poppy and Branch make a surprising discovery — there are other Troll worlds beyond their own, and their distinct differences create big clashes between these various tribes. When a mysterious threat puts all of the Trolls across the land in danger, Poppy, Branch, and their band of friends must embark on an epic quest to create harmony among the feuding Trolls to unite them against certain doom.
cast.title: Trolls World Tour

details.biography: Sweet baby brother and 30 under 30 media luminary Griffin McElroy is an American podcaster and former video game journalist. He often collaborates with his two older brothers, Justin and Travis, on various projects including podcasts and video content. He is one of the founding editors of Polygon, a video game journalism website, which he has since departed. He is largely known for his comedic work, which is generally positive and inclusive in nature.
details.name: Griffin McElroy
